channel.title: Do anyone know how i can replace the emo bar teleing thingy
channel.description: when u tele places like train and other stuff with the emo bar how can i change the tele??

item.title: Do anyone know how i can replace the emo bar teleing thingy
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

this is in ur client.java

example:

case 167: if (teleblock == true) { // Made by musicmad441 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("farm"); // made by matthew } break;

search the case.

if there isnt one then make one

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("farm")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by matthew } else { teleportToX = 2815; teleportToY = 3461; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Welcome To The farming spot"); }

u mean like this.
this makes farming clickable on case 167 which is a emote icon

Read full topic

item.title: Do anyone know how i can replace the emo bar teleing thingy
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

u mean emotes.? go into ur texthandler.txt and find a used name from ur emotes for example.
: p.sendFrame126("@gre@Veng", 178);
and change it to say what u want it to.

then compile iit and re run the server itll say something else

and if u wanna change wha tit does i think thats a client case.

im not sure ive forgot a lot of things i knew about private servers :S

i hope i helped a little.

Read full topic
